div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1714 Mit Rahineh, near Memphis, 20 km. S of Cairo, 1919 Burial: c. 88 B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 36 AR, 1AE. From excavations in pocket of late wall, cloth of wrapping still adhering to some coins Ptolemy X Alexander I and Cleopatra: tetradr. (Alexandreia incl. Svoronos 1728) Ptolemy X Alexander I alone: tetradr. (Alexandreia incl. Sv. 1676, 1679) Ptolemy ?: AE Disposition: Philadelphia (University Mu- seum, Egyptian section) Information from G. K. Jenkins
